subject: New Business Submission - Innovate Corp
body:
Dear Alex,

Please find attached the new business submission for Innovate Corp. They are seeking General Liability and Property coverage for their tech company operations.

Key details:
- Software development services
- 5-story office building
- Revenue: $15M annually
- 75 employees

Please review and let us know if you need any additional information.

Best regards,
Marsh Team

attachments.mockContent: Application form for Innovate Corp with company details, operations description, and coverage requirements.

subject: Re: New Business Submission - Innovate Corp - Information Request
body:
Dear Marsh Team,

Thank you for the submission for Innovate Corp. I've reviewed the application and need some additional information to proceed with the quote:

1. Please provide the loss run for the past 3 years
2. We need details on their cyber security practices and any existing cyber insurance
3. Please confirm the building construction details and fire protection systems

Once I receive this information, I'll be able to provide a comprehensive quote.

Best regards,
Alex Underwriter

subject: Re: New Business Submission - Innovate Corp - Additional Information
body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the quick response. Please find the requested information attached:

1. Loss run for 2021-2023 (clean record)
2. Cyber security policy document
3. Building specifications and fire protection details

Let me know if you need anything else.

Regards,
Marsh Team

attachments.mockContent: Loss run showing no claims for the past 3 years.
Detailed cyber security policy and procedures document.

subject: Cyber & E&O Quote Request - Apex Enterprises
body:
Hello,

We have a new client, Apex Enterprises, seeking Cyber Liability and E&O coverage. They are an e-commerce platform provider handling sensitive client data.

Key risk factors:
- PCI-DSS compliance (self-attested)
- Handles PII and payment data
- Multiple client platforms

Please review and provide terms.

Thanks,
Gallagher Team

attachments.mockContent: Application form for Apex Enterprises with detailed operations and risk information.

subject: Re: Cyber & E&O Quote Request - Apex Enterprises - Subject to Conditions
body:
Dear Gallagher Team,

Thank you for the submission for Apex Enterprises. After reviewing the application, I can provide terms subject to the following conditions:

1. Full MFA implementation on all admin accounts within 30 days
2. Third-party PCI-DSS compliance validation
3. Details on CCPA/CPRA compliance approach

Premium: $75,000

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex Underwriter

subject: Endorsement Request - Future Solutions Ltd.
body:
Hi Support Team,

We need to add a new vehicle to the existing commercial auto policy for Future Solutions Ltd.

Vehicle details:
- 2024 Ford Transit
- VIN: 1FTNE2EW4PDA12345
- Use: Delivery services

Please process this endorsement.

Thanks,
Aon Team

subject: Renewal Application - Synergy Group
body:
Dear Sarah,

Please find the renewal application for Synergy Group. They've had some changes in their operations and revenue.

Key updates:
- Revenue increased to $25M (from $18M)
- New office location added
- Additional employees (now 150 total)

Please review and provide renewal terms.

Best regards,
WTW Team

attachments.mockContent: Renewal application with updated company information and operations details.
